block.p: Barbara Hauptman has been named executive director of Dance Theater Foundation Inc., which administers the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater and the Ailey school and junior company. Ms. Hauptman was formerly director of the Bardavon 1869 Opera House in Poughkeepsie, N.Y. She was also director of the Twyla Tharp Dance Foundation and worked with the Theater Development Fund, New York State Council on the Arts, the Williamstown Theater Festival and Saatchi & Saatchi Compton Inc. She succeeds Michael M. Kaiser, who will return to Kaiser Planning Group, a consulting firm.
